meanings.definition: A post at the corner of a bedstead to support the canopy or curtains.
meanings.sent1: The bedposts held up the beautiful canopy above the bed.
meanings.sent2: She tied the curtains to the bedposts to create a cozy nook.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the bedposts were perfect for a scratching session.
meanings.sent4: The bedposts stood tall like guardians at the corners of the bed.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the bedposts added elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: The vertical supports at the corners of a bed frame.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally bumped into one of the bedposts and woke himself up.
meanings.sent2: The bed creaked as she leaned against the sturdy bedposts.
meanings.sent3: The toddler found a hiding spot behind the bedposts during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: In the darkness, the bedposts seemed like looming giants in the room.
meanings.sent5: The old bedposts showed signs of wear but still stood strong.
